welcomeMsg:
If you're stuck scrolling through Netflix for your next movie to watch, use this helpful website to get your next recommendation.
You can see your top recommended movies below, as well as a search bar allowing you to search by Movie Title, and filter by Genre.
The more movies you rate, the better the recommendations!
searchTags: Include search results from User Generated Tags
searchFull: Search result must include full phrase
Title: Title
loginError:
Oops, invalid username!
Create one or use: Alex, Harry, Rachel, Oskar or Sofia
userTaken: Sorry, that username is already taken
userMovieLens: UserID to use from MovieLensDB (1-610), leave blank for brand new user
idError: Please enter a number between 1 and 610
idExists: Sorry, that MovieLens ID is already taken
tooltip: Rebuild the Matricies used for Recommendations, this takes a few seconds and will only make a difference after adding several ratings.
regTooltip: Regestering a new user will take a few seconds, please be patient.
